abstract: Agroscope Institute says transition from age-old milking methods in barns to fully automated, industrial milking systems has caused holes in Swiss cheese to decline.
lead_paragraph: The mystery of Swiss cheese and its disappearing holes has been solved: The milk is too clean.

headline.main: Switzerland: Scientists Find the Secret to the Holes in Swiss Cheese: Hay Dust
headline.print_headline: Europe; Switzerland: Scientists Find the Secret to the Holes in Swiss Cheese: Hay Dust

snippet: The mystery of Swiss cheese and its disappearing holes has been solved: The milk is too clean.
